title: Projects
text: Below is a selection of projects completed during my training, internships, and personal development. These projects reflect my profile as a Full‑Stack Developer with strong QA / Testing expertise, focusing on real use cases, clean structure, and software quality.

projects.title: 1. Edulien – Educational Management Platform
projects.description: A platform designed for class management with a role‑based access control system.
keyFuture: Teachers can create and manage classes
Students can be added via email

projects.title: 2. CodeurFreelance – Showcase Website
projects.description: IFrontend-only showcase website with modern, responsive, and multilingual interface. Developed as part of a team during internship.
